Keywords: Assassin , Martial Artist , Robot , Spy , Warp World
Real Name: Raven
Special Powers
SHAPESHIFTER: Plasticity, Sidestep. // Opposing characters 4 or more squares away can't draw lines of fire to Deathstrique.
DEADLY ASSASSIN: Outwit. When Deathstrique uses it and has 0 action tokens, she may choose an additional power.

Post Comment
Comments
February 25, 2022
tidge
In a different era, this would be an incredible dial for the cost... but in 2022 this is a bit of a head-scratcher for me. I can't imagine trying to build a team around this piece, and at 75-points I don't know that (for whatever team I am building, except maybe Warp World) I wouldn't think of a better use of the points. I always find it odd when a character's dial seems perfectly suited to deal with itself. It isn't a bad dial, although I think that in the era of no-pushing, the special Outwit seems likely to be wasted.
August 12, 2021
Goop
She's good for 75points. Nothing really incredible for a chase but a solid attacker who has some protection against range. Kind of an interesting mix of melee and range herself. I dont like that she only has sidestep for mobility. Mostly all generic keywords.
